Paladin - Class in Roles

printbackgroundProperties(String[], int) - Static method in class Backgrounds.Background
 
printChoices(String[]) - Method in class handlers.Character
printChoices() is a helper method that loops over an Array and prints the choices.
printChosenSkills() - Method in class handlers.Character
Prints the stored Skill objects in the Role objects ArrayList of Type Skill which are then printed with a for each loop.
printCompleteCharacter() - Method in class handlers.Character
Prints the entire character to the user, when the character is complete.
printProperties(String[], int) - Static method in class Races.Race
 
printRoleSkills() - Method in class handlers.Character
Helper method that prints the available type String objects stored in the instanced Role child objects role.availableRoleSkills() method
printStats() - Method in class handlers.Character
Handles the printing of the characters Stats Uses the Utilities to format the type String and ResourceBundles to get the property file "Character".
